JSON.createObjectComma.description: Create JSON object ending with comma.

JSON.createArrayComma.description: Create JSON array ending with comma.

JSON.createPairComma.description:
Create JSON key/value pair ending with comma.
Recommended for nested objects.

JSON.createPairCommaLn.description:
Create JSON key/value pair ending with comma and jumping to next line.
Not recommended for nested objects.

JSON.createValc.description: Create JSON value element ending withy comma.
